#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MOD2 1000000009
#define MOD3 100000007

using namespace std;
#define MAXN 1010
typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<ll,ll> ii;
typedef vector<ii> vii;
int n,m;
string s;
ll tab[MAXN][MAXN];
ll tab2[MAXN][MAXN];

int main(){
  int t; cin >> t;
  for(int i = 0; i < MAXN; ++i){
    tab[i][0] = tab[0][i] = 1;
    tab2[i][0] = tab2[0][i] = 1;
  }
  for(int i = 1; i < MAXN; ++i){
    for(int j = 1; j < MAXN; ++j){
      tab[i][j] = tab[i-1][j]+tab[i][j-1];
      tab[i][j] %= MOD;
      tab2[i][j] = tab2[i-1][j]+tab2[i][j-1];
      tab2[i][j] %= MOD2;
    }
  }
  n = m = 1000;
  for(int cass = 0; cass < t; ++cass){
    cin >> s;
    ll x = 0;
    ll x2 = 0;
    for(int i = 0; i < s.size(); ++i){
      x *= 10;
      x += int(s[i]-'0');
      x %= MOD;
      x2 *= 10;
      x2 += int(s[i]-'0');
      x2 %= MOD2;
    }
    vii sol;
    for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i){
      for(int j = 0; j < m; ++j){
	if(tab[i][j] == x and tab2[i][j] == x2){
	  sol.push_back(ii(i,j));
	}
      }
    }
//     for(int i = 0; i < 10; ++i){
//       for(int j = 0; j < 10; ++j){
// 	cout << tab[i][j] << ' ';
//       }
//       cout << '\n';
//     }
    if(sol.size() == 0){
      cout << "The Grid is Too Big!\n";
      continue;
    }
    cout << sol.size() << '\n';
    for(int i = 0; i < sol.size(); ++i){
      cout << sol[i].first+1 << ' ' << sol[i].second+1 << '\n';
    }
  }
}
